description:
proto/lib: Remove redundant allocations in helper functions.

Slightly simplify the proto.{Bool,Int32,Int64,Float32,Float64,Uint32,Uint64,String}
functions. The generated code doesn't seem to change except for String.

08/08: Ping! If this change is too trivial to bother with, just let me know and I'll drop it.
subject: proto/lib: Remove redundant allocations in helper functions.
